text: The Volkswagen Scirocco is a car produced by Volkswagen from 1974 to 1992 and again from 2008 to 2017. The Scirocco is a sports coupé with 3 doors and a 4-cylinder petrol or diesel engine. title: Volkswagen Scirocco
